alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 7:07PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Twin Falls, east central Owyhee and south central Gooding Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 706 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Castleford, or 25 miles southwest of Jerome, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Twin Falls, east central Owyhee and south central Gooding Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley
